about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Active Clothing Co Limited manufactures and sells readymade garments for men, women, kids, boys, and girls in India.

They offers sweaters, T-shirts, knitted T-shirts, fashion shirts, designer T-shirts, V-neck T-shirts, round neck T-shirts, printed round neck T-shirts, full knitted polo T-shirts, and knitted bottom wears as well as hooded, sleeveless, designer jackets under the AAGAIN brand name. They also operates a multi branded store for fashion products.

The Company has a total capacity 12,58,810 pieces of sweaters, 242,190 pieces of jackets and 7,80,000 T-Shirts and Sweatshirts. The key customer base of the Company includes Levi Strauss (India) Pvt. Ltd., U.S Polo, Arrow, Izod, United Colours of Benetton, Numero Uno, Basics, Aero staple, Elle, Iconic, Pepe Jeans, Impulse buying house and other reputed international brands.The Company is also a distributor for international brands such as Levis, Celios, Arvind owned licensee brands Ed Hardy, Flying Machine.

faqs.question: What is the Active Clothing IPO?
faqs.answer:
Active Clothing IPO is a SME IPO of 4086000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹26.56 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹65 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 12, 2018, and closes on March 16, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Active Clothing IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Active Clothing IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Active Clothing IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Active Clothing IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Active Clothing IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Active Clothing IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Active Clothing IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
